data.name: The Lotus Holidays Demo
data.detailed_description:
Deeply in need of a holiday, you enter an online contest for a free weekend at the "Lotus", a new, luxurious spa resort by the countryside.

You arrive at the place, after finding out that you've won. Soon, an alarm goes off and you find yourself passed out. Next day you wake up, only to be informed that you were infected with a rare type of virus.

You will have to go through a 5-day treatment where the meds will give you severe side-effects, and the mysterious behavior of the staff and fellow patients will soon make you wonder if any of the above is actually true, or if you're trapped in a far more sinister situation.

The Lotus Holidays is an exercise in misdirection, and also a story about a scam within a scam within a scam.
It aspires to be an experience that is equally immersive and allusive.

Features:
  • A rich, engaging story with lots of twists and turns.
  • Deep audiovisual immersion, with a side of sci-fi existentialism.
  • Explore a large world that is both charming and mysterious.
  • Interact with lots of quirky and shady characters.
  • Multiple endings: You ultimately get to decide the outcome of your very own fate.
